adHeader: Nanny, Mother Helper Looking For Morning, A.M Work 4 Additional Family
adDetails: I am a self-employed contractor who currently works as a part-time nanny, and personal organizer. I also am the household housekeeper, grocery shopper, laundry-doer, event host, etc. in our household. I am extremely organized. Prior to starting my own business in 2008, I worked for a large electronics corporate company for 6 years, and worked at a PR agency and newspaper before that. I currently am looking to help a family during weekday mornings - flexible as to the days and times. I can start as early as 6 a.m., and work as late as needed. My rate is $25/hour South Bay, and I cover the following cities: San Jose, Los Gatos, Saratoga, Campbell, Sunnyvale, Cupertino, Mountain View, Los Altos and Palo Alto. I do request a 3-hour minimum on any given day that I am working. I am flexible as to how many and which days a week, and can go with a flexible or structured schedule. I don't just nanny, I also can help organize a household, run errands, handle laundry, prepare meals, etc. Please note, I will include in my invoice to you any mileage that I drive while working for you. This does not mean my mileage to get to you. It does mean if I am using my car to pick up something or someone from destination A, and then dropping them off at destination B (examples: picking up children, taking them to school, running errands, etc.). The rate is whatever the IRS determines as the rate. English is my native language, and I am fluent in it (I also majored in English and writing in college (SJSU), and hold a Bachelor's degree. I have excellent communication and writing skills, and I am very hardworking. If I sound like someone who can help out your household, please contact me today. I also have extended experience in the following: Cooking / Food Prep - I cook at least 2 meals daily from scratch. Organizing - everything from the kitchen, living room, garage, closets, etc. Dog Walking Pet-Sitting Running Errands Typing, Internet research, Microsoft Word & Excel
